original_text: As for the sons of Levi, their heads of fathers' houses were written in the Book of the Chronicles until the days of Johanan the son of Eliashib.
korean_text: 레위 자손의 족장들은 엘리아십의 아들 요하난 때까지 역대지략에 기록되었으며

sentences.original_text: As for the sons of Levi,
were written in the Book of the Chronicles
until the days of Johanan the son of Eliashib.
